raw_comment: The US is using about 2x the energy per person as China and about 8x as India. It reflects the populations living in those countries with a standard of living similar to the US.  Green sources are increasing in all 3.  Coal is a substantial proportion of energy production.
ace_sentences: The US uses about 2 times as much energy per person as China.
The US uses about 8 times as much energy per person as India.
This reflects the populations that live in China and India.
These populations have a standard of living that is similar to the standard of living in the US.
Green energy sources increase in the US.
Green energy sources increase in China.
Green energy sources increase in India.
Coal is a substantial proportion of energy production.
